metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14851 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
exif_process_IFD_in_MAKERNOTE in ext/exif/exif.c in PHP before 5.6.37, 7.0.x before 7.0.31, 7.1.x before 7.1.20, and 7.2.x before 7.2.8 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted JPEG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.10-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.10-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
php7.2 - 7.2.10-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
php7.2-bcmath - 7.2.10-0ubuntu0.18.04.1

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2.10-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
